LanguageData.AutoArm_DisableDuringRaidsDesc: Temporarily disable auto-equip when the game detects high danger (major raids/threats) to boost performance. Plays nicer with other mods as well.
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllowForcedWeaponUpgrades: Allow quality upgrades for forced weapons
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllowForcedWeaponUpgradesDesc: When enabled, colonists can upgrade forced weapons to better quality versions of the same type (e.g., normal revolver → masterwork revolver).
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllowTemporaryColonistsDesc: When enabled, temporary colonists (quest lodgers, borrowed pawns, royal guests) can auto-equip weapons.
LanguageData.AutoArm_EnableModDesc: When enabled, colonists will automatically equip better weapons based on their outfit policy. When disabled, all automatic weapon management is turned off.
LanguageData.AutoArm_ShowNotificationsDesc: Shows notification messages when colonists equip or upgrade weapons.
LanguageData.AutoArm_EquippingSidearm: {0} is picking up {1} as a sidearm
LanguageData.AutoArm_ForceWeaponDesc: When enabled, bonded persona weapons are automatically marked as forced, preventing automatic switching.
LanguageData.AutoArm_AutoequipSpeedBoostTooltip: Colonists run to pick up a new weapon (Normal = 1.0)
LanguageData.AutoArm_CivilianModeTooltip: During peaceful times, pawns will drop their weapons at high joy and pick them up when drafted or at lower joy
LanguageData.AutoArm_EnableSidearmAutoEquipDesc: Allows colonists to automatically pick up additional weapons as sidearms.
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllowSidearmUpgradesDesc: When enabled, colonists will upgrade existing sidearms to better quality.
LanguageData.AutoArm_RequireAmmunitionDesc: When enabled, colonists will only pick up weapons if they have access to appropriate ammunition.
LanguageData.AutoArm_SimpleSidearmsSeparateTooltip: When enabled, pawns will search for and equip sidearms as a separate task from their primary weapon
LanguageData.AutoArm_SimpleSidearmsReflectionFailed: ⚠ SimpleSidearms integration failed - reflection error. These features are disabled.
LanguageData.AutoArm_CheckCEAmmoDesc: When enabled, colonists will only pick up weapons if they have access to appropriate ammunition. Disabling this will result in colonists carrying weapons they don't have ammo for.
LanguageData.AutoArm_NoCompatModsDetected: None - using base game features only
LanguageData.AutoArm_ThresholdDesc: How much better a weapon needs to be before colonists will switch. Lower values mean more frequent switching.
LanguageData.AutoArm_WeaponPreferenceDesc: Adjust how much all colonists prefer ranged vs melee weapons.
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllowChildrenToEquipWeapons: Allow colonists under 18 to auto-equip weapons
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllowChildrenToEquipWeaponsDesc: When enabled, teenagers can auto-equip weapons based on the age slider below (vanilla allows 13+). When disabled, only adults (18+) will auto-equip weapons. Note: Vanilla already prevents children under 13 from using any weapons.
LanguageData.AutoArm_MinimumAgeDesc: Minimum age for children to auto-equip weapons
LanguageData.AutoArm_SearchRadiusTooltip: How far pawns will look for weapons (tiles)
LanguageData.AutoArm_EnablePerformanceModeTooltip: Automatically adjusts check frequency based on colony size for better performance
LanguageData.AutoArm_ImportantNote: Important: Set both to 0 to disable Auto Arm
LanguageData.AutoArm_EnableDebugLoggingDesc: Outputs detailed information to the debug log for troubleshooting. This will create many log entries and may impact performance. Only enable when reporting issues.
LanguageData.AutoArm_DumpCachedScores: Dump cached weapon scores to log
LanguageData.AutoArm_DebugRequiresActiveGame: Debug tools require an active game
LanguageData.AutoArm_AllTestsRun: All AutoArm tests have been run.
LanguageData.AutoArm_CachedScoresDumped: Cached weapon scores have been dumped to the log.
